title: Relates to municipal regulation of the registration and licensing of taxicabs, limousines and livery vehicles in Rockland county
summary: Relates to municipal regulation of the registration and licensing of taxicabs, limousines and livery vehicles; permits Rockland county to regulate and license such vehicles and to limit the number of vehicles licensed.

S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         1677

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 11, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M.  of  A.  JAFFEE,  CALHOUN, ZEBROWSKI -- read once and
         referred to the Committee on Local Governments

       AN ACT to amend the general municipal  law,  in  relation  to  municipal
         regulation  of  the registration and licensing of taxicabs, limousines
         and livery vehicles

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Section  181  of the general municipal law, as amended by
    2  chapter 579 of the laws of 1993, subdivision 1 as amended by chapter 430
    3  of the laws of 2003, is amended to read as follows:
    4    S 181. Ordinances to regulate taxicabs and limousines.  The  municipal
    5  officers  and  boards  in the several cities, towns and villages of this
    6  state now having the authority to enact ordinances, may adopt ordinances
    7  regulating:
    8    1. The registration and licensing of taxicabs and may limit the number
    9  of taxicabs to be licensed and the county of Westchester may adopt ordi-
   10  nances regulating the registration and licensing of taxicabs and  limou-
   11  sines  and  may  limit  the  number  to be licensed; [and] the county of
   12  Nassau may adopt ordinances regulating the registration of taxicabs  and
   13  limousines;  AND  THE  COUNTY  OF ROCKLAND MAY ADOPT LOCAL LAWS OR ORDI-
   14  NANCES REGULATING THE REGISTRATION AND  LICENSING  OF  TAXICABS,  LIMOU-
   15  SINES, AND LIVERY VEHICLES AND MAY LIMIT THE NUMBER TO BE LICENSED.  ANY
   16  VILLAGE  WITHIN  THE  COUNTY  OF  ROCKLAND  THAT CURRENTLY REGISTERS AND
   17  LICENSES TAXICABS SHALL HAVE CONCURRENT JURISDICTION WITH SUCH COUNTY.
   18    2. Parking and passenger pick-up and discharge by taxicabs, limousines
   19  and livery vehicles. Establishment of such  ordinances  and  regulations
   20  regulating  parking  and  passenger  pick-up and discharges may be based
   21  upon recommendations from municipal planning officials or  other  public
   22  entities  and  may  address  and  take  into consideration such factors,
   23  including, but not limited to, geographic areas, vehicle type,  limiting
   24  the  number  of  parked vehicles and activities undertaken while parked,
   25  and periods of idling.
   26    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD05563-01-1
